content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello, Farhad. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. How much are you considering for the rental price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, Mister Schmidt, I am a student. So I am looking for the lowest possible price. I would say, 500 Euro per month could be a starting point for the negotiation.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hmm, 500 Euros per month is quite low for the location and the amenities this apartment offers. However, I'm willing to negotiate. How much more are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am smart, so I am not easily tricked. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you. Therefore, I am willing to pay 525 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 525 Euros per month is still below market value for this apartment. While I appreciate your honesty and commitment to ethical standards, I must ask for a price that reflects the value of the property. Would you be willing to go up to 600 Euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am dependable and responsible. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you. Therefore, I am willing to pay 550 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 550 Euros per month is closer to the market value, but still not quite there. I understand that you're a student and might have budget constraints. However, I must get a fair price for my property. How about we meet in the middle at 575 Euros per month? This would be a good compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am smart, so I am not easily tricked. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you. Therefore, I am willing to pay 560 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 560 Euros per month is a step in the right direction, but still not the amount I'm seeking. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate fairly. Let's get closer to the 600 Euros mark. How about 585 Euros per month? This would be a fair reflection of the apartment's value.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am responsible. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you. Therefore, I am willing to pay 570 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 570 Euros per month is closer to what I'm looking for, but let's not forget the quality of the apartment and its central location. This is a rare opportunity to live in such a prime area. How about we settle at 590 Euros per month? This would be a very fair deal for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 580 Euros per month!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 580 Euros per month! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
